wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Herron (1909–2003) was a Scottish minister and biblical scholar. He served as Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland in 1971.

link_mentions.page: List of Moderators of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland
response: *1971 Andrew Herron (Clerk to the Presbytery of Glasgow)
*1985: Kirk by Divine Right, by Very Rev Andrew Herron
